readingFromFile() - Static method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Data
Reads the data from the file and turns it into seasons, leagues, teams and player
readingFromFile(Context) - Static method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.DataAndroidApp
Uses either the readFromFileAsset() function if no file has been created or the readFromInternalFile() function if there is already an existant file.
readingFromFileAsset(Context) - Static method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.DataAndroidApp
Reads the data from the application original file and turns it into seasons, leagues, teams and player
readingFromInternalFile(Context) - Static method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.DataAndroidApp
Reads the data from the phone's internal file and turns it into seasons, leagues, teams and player
removeLeague(League) - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Season
Remove a league from the current season.
removeLeagueByName(String, Context) - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Season
Remove a league from its name.
removePlayer(Player) - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Team
Removes a player from the current team.
removePlayerByName(String, Context) - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Team
Removes a player from the current team from its name.
removeSeasonByName(String, Context) - Static method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Season
Removes a season from its name.
removeTeam(Team) - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.League
Removes a team from the current league
removeTeamByName(String, Context) - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.League
Removes a team on the current league from the current league
resetCards() - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Player
Resets all the temporary cards given to the current player during a game.
resetCards() - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Team
Resets the cards received by a player during a match for all the players of the current team.
resetData() - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.League
Resets the data (match results, player data) of all the players of the current league
resetData() - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Season
Resets the data (teams' results, players' data) from all the seasons.
resetDataPlayer() - Method in class ecse321.SoccerKeeper.controller.Player
Resets all the current player's data.
